verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: On his way home from his summit with Kim Jong Un in Singapore] , [ARG0: President Trump] [V: met] [ARGM-MNR: briefly] [ARGM-TMP: during an early morning refueling stopover with the governor of Guam , the U.S. Pacific island territory which Kim last year threatened to target with ballistic missiles] .

On his way home from his summit with Kim Jong Un in Singapore , President Trump met briefly during an early morning refueling stopover with the governor of Guam , the U.S. Pacific island territory which [ARG0: Kim] [ARGM-TMP: last year] [V: threatened] [ARG1: to target with ballistic missiles] .

On his way home from his summit with Kim Jong Un in Singapore , President Trump met briefly during an early morning refueling stopover with the governor of Guam , [ARG1: the U.S. Pacific island territory] [R-ARG1: which] [ARG0: Kim] last year threatened to [V: target] [ARGM-MNR: with ballistic missiles] .
